entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload fails with "ENC1002: The given key <assembly> was not present in the dictionary." #67497
  • release/dev17.6 builds are failing an assert in Bootstrap build #67495
  • Invalid IL produced for an always-throwing filter expression #67494
  • No ref safety error reported for switch expression with locals used in switch statement or foreach statement expression #67493
  • Extract Method "continue anyway" does not work #67488

Closed

  • Multiple features not working: Process Telemetry, Diagnostics Analyzer and Solution Events are not available. #67490
    17.6 P3
  • `SyntaxEditor` cannot change nested nodes properly #67499
  • Double click Inline parameter doesn't handle reserved keyword properly #66817
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Display inheritance margin's content of menu item in TextBlock #67506
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Remove code for 'push' diagnostic tagging #67505
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reorder workspace parameter for clarity #67504
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add razor compiler EA assembly to VSIX #67501
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Issue with VBCSCompiler directory on linux #67489
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.7
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog

Merged

  • Pass through document open/close information to the workspace in LSP scenarios. #67498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Limit walk during pragma directive analysis to subtrees containing directives #67491
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Include explicit BCL references for .NET 6 VS OOP #67503
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #67500
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67502
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [Infra] Fix 17.6 build #67496
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add '@' prefix when inline hint value is a reserved keyword in C# #67484
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Document break for implicit locals of restricted type in async code #67466
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't show expanded items in certain cases #67049
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #67508
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #67507
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update ExtractInterface to use IRefactoringHelpersService #67482
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2145186 #67418
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #67078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix crash in `NullableWalker.LocalState.GetValue(int)` #67486
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP #67392
    Area-Analyzers
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
